name: Little Fishy
description:
Well,

PolyMars has a game jam for team seas (which you can donate here btw im just saying: https://teamseas.org/) and i decided to make a game for it. Unfortunately, my unity thingo broke and i couldn't be bothered to reinstall. So, i downloaded godot instead. Forcing me to learn a brand new dumb coding language in 2 days to provide the best top down shooter i could produce.

Features a little fishy fending off the horrendous rubbish in the ocean with nothing but his little bubble buster thing forcibly strapped to his back. 

also take the time to check out my awesome atrocious first video on YouTube: 

Power ups include increased damage and increased reload speed.

So, download now (im just saying)

Mouseuse it to aim, click it to shootKeyboardW,A,S,D to move
